Package com.hexaware.dao

Interface IVirtualArtGallery

All Known Implementing Classes:
VirtualArtGalleryImpl
public interface IVirtualArtGallery
Interface defining methods for interacting with the virtual art gallery system. This interface provides methods for managing artworks, user favorites, and galleries.

  • Method Summary

    Description

  • Method Details

    • addArtwork

      boolean addArtwork(Artwork artwork)
      Adds a new artwork to the virtual art gallery.
      Parameters:
      artwork - The Artwork object representing the artwork to be added.
      Returns:
      True if the artwork is added successfully, false otherwise.

    • updateArtwork

      boolean updateArtwork(Artwork artwork)
      Updates the details of an existing artwork in the virtual art gallery.
      Parameters:
      artwork - The Artwork object containing the updated details.
      Returns:
      True if the artwork is updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • removeArtwork

      boolean removeArtwork(int artworkID)
      Removes an artwork from the virtual art gallery.
      Parameters:
      artworkID - The ID of the artwork to be removed.
      Returns:
      True if the artwork is removed successfully, false otherwise.

    • getArtworkById

      Artwork getArtworkById(int artworkID) throws ArtworkNotFoundException
      Retrieves an artwork by its ID from the virtual art gallery.
      Parameters:
      artworkID - The ID of the artwork to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The Artwork object representing the retrieved artwork.
      Throws:
      ArtworkNotFoundException - If the artwork with the specified ID is not found.

    • searchArtworks

      List<Artwork> searchArtworks(String keyword)
      Searches for artworks in the virtual art gallery based on a keyword.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The keyword to be used for searching.
      Returns:
      A List of Artwork objects matching the search criteria.

    • addArtworkToFavorite

      boolean addArtworkToFavorite(int userID, int artworkID)
      Adds an artwork to a user's favorite list.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user for whom the artwork is to be favorited.
      artworkID - The ID of the artwork to be added to the user's favorites.
      Returns:
      True if the artwork is added to the user's favorites successfully, false otherwise.

    • removeArtworkFromFavorite

      boolean removeArtworkFromFavorite(int userID, int artworkID)
      Removes an artwork from a user's favorite list.
      Parameters:
      userID - The ID of the user from whose favorites the artwork is to be removed.
      artworkID - The ID of the artwork to be removed from the user's favorites.
      Returns:
      True if the artwork is removed from the user's favorites successfully, false otherwise.

    • getUserFavoriteArtworks

      List<Artwork> getUserFavoriteArtworks(int userId) throws UserNotFoundException
      Retrieves a list of artworks from a user's favorite list.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose favorite artworks are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A List of Artwork objects representing the user's favorite artworks.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - If the user with the specified ID is not found.

    • createNewGallery

      boolean createNewGallery(Gallery gallery)
      Updates the details of an existing gallery in the virtual art gallery.
      Parameters:
      gallery - The Gallery object containing the updated details.
      Returns:
      True if the gallery is updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • updateGallery

      boolean updateGallery(Gallery gallery)
      Updates the details of an existing gallery in the virtual art gallery.
      Parameters:
      gallery - The Gallery object containing the updated details.
      Returns:
      True if the gallery is updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • removeGallery

      boolean removeGallery(int artworkID)
      Removes a gallery from the virtual art gallery.
      Parameters:
      galleryID - The ID of the gallery to be removed.
      Returns:
      True if the gallery is removed successfully, false otherwise.

    • searchGallery

      List<Gallery> searchGallery(String keyword)
      Searches for galleries in the virtual art gallery based on a keyword.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The keyword to be used for searching.
      Returns:
      A List of Gallery objects matching the search criteria.
